articles.title: Trump says he’s awarding former New York Mayor Rudy Giuliani the Presidential Medal of Freedom - Politico
articles.description: Trump in a statement on social media called Giuliani the “greatest Mayor in the history of New York City, and an equally great American Patriot.”
articles.content: For much of the past two decades, Giulianis public life has been defined by a striking rise and fall. After leading New York through the aftermath of Sept. 11, he mounted a brief campaign for the Rep… [+1545 chars]

articles.title: The Night Sky In September 2025: Two Eclipses, Bright Aurora And Saturn - Forbes
articles.description: Each month, I pick out North America’s celestial highlights for the weeks ahead (which also apply to mid-northern latitudes in the Northern Hemisphere).
